Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 1. Understand the Goal: The objective is to create a process mining event log from a set of relational database tables (Orders, Order Lines, Delivery, Invoice, Payments, Products, Resources). The output must be a single table where each row is an event, sorted chronologically per case (order_id).

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: 2. Analyze the Input Data: * Orders Table: order_id (Case ID), order_date (Start Event), sales_person_id (Resource), customer_type, order_priority. * Order Lines Table: order_id, item_picking_date (Activity), picker_id (Resource), item_id, quantity.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Challenge: Multiple rows per order. Do I create one event per item or aggregate per order? The prompt suggests Items Picked event(s). For process mining, having one event per order for Picking Completed is often cleaner, but Item Picked per line offers more granularity.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Decision: The prompt asks to Derive Activities... Items Picked event(s) from the Order Lines table. It implies multiple events are okay. produce one event per activity if itâ€™s meaningful. I will create separate rows for each line item.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Delivery Table: order_id, delivery_dispatch_date (Activity), delivery_arrival_date (Activity), carrier_id (Resource). Note: One order can have multiple deliveries (e.g., Order 1002 has DLV-5002 and DLV-5003).

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Payments Table: invoice_id (links to Invoice, which links to Order), payment_date (Activity). Need to join Invoice to Order to get Case ID. Resources Table: Maps IDs to Names/Roles.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: 5. Refining Activity Names: * Orders -> Create Order * Order Lines -> Pick Item * Delivery Dispatch -> Dispatch Order * Delivery Arrival -> Deliver Order * Invoice -> Issue Invoice * Payment -> Receive Payment.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Order 1004: *No Delivery Record:* ... For the event log, I only list events that happened. *No Invoice Record:* Order 1004 has no invoice. Assumption: I will only list events present in the data.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Self-Correction on Resource Mapping: * SP-001: Alice Brown (Sales Person) ... Payment table doesnt have a resource ID. I will mark Resource as Customer or External. Self-Correction on Activity Names: Make them consistent.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Check timestamps for Order 1002: Dispatch 1: 01-04 Dispatch 2: 01-05 ... Looks consistent. Sorting: Primary Sort: Case ID ... Secondary Sort: Timestamp (chronological).

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Handling Missing Data/Assumptions: * Order 1004 is an incomplete process instance. * Pick Item is treated as a distinct event per line item. Final Column Set: Case ID, Activity Name, Timestamp, Resource, Reference ID, Customer Type, Order Priority, Event Details.
